name: js-ast-experiments-of-mine
description: Online Playground for playing with JavaScript AST related technologies like recast, jscodeshift, ast-types, astring, acorn, escodegen, etc.

scripts.browserify: browserify dist/src/main.js -t br-fs-to-json  -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] -o static/src.js
scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run browserify
scripts.copy: npm run copy-static && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.slim.min.js node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js packages/eslintbro/bundle/eslint.js node_modules/bootstrap-submenu/dist/js/bootstrap-submenu.min.js node_modules/bootstrap-submenu/dist/css/bootstrap-submenu.min.css static && ts-node scripts/hack_eslint.ts && npm run copy-examples
scripts.watch-tsc: watch -p "src/**/*" -c "npm run copy-examples && npm run tsc "
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-tsc" "npm run watch-browserify" "npm run browser-sync" "npm run watch-static"
scripts.build-production2: rm -rf static docs2 src/build && npm run tsc && npm run copy && npx bankai build dist/src/main.js && rm -rf static dist docs2 && mv src/dist static && npm run copy && mv static docs2
scripts.build-production: rm -rf static docs && npm run copy && npm run build && npm run minify && mv static docs && npm run copy
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build-production

author: Sebastian Gurin
